file_content.text: The Gormak are weak without their king.
Voss-Ka is in danger. The Gormak must be stopped.
You are the outsiders Laryn-Ki mentioned.
Jedi. Laryn-Ki spoke of you.
You are the outsider commando.
Outsider. I have been waiting.
I bear an urgent message. Stand by.
I am Pevthak-Fra, of the Gorma-Koss commandos.
The Mystics have seen you defeat the Gormak. The time has come.
The Gormak cannon is almost complete. Voss-Ka will be destroyed.
How did the Gormak get a weapon like that?
They have a cannon that big?
The Gormak have toiled for years. We underestimated them.
I won't let that happen.
The Mystics saw nothing of Voss-Ka. The city may be lost.
Oh, you're exaggerating.
The Gormak defy reason. They sacrifice all for a weapon.
The cannon points to Voss-Ka. The Gormak march forward.
The commandos will stop the invasion. You will stop the cannon.
If there's a way to destroy that cannon, I'll find it.
You can depend on me.
You will not enter Gorma-Koss blind.
The Gormak will find other ways to attack Voss-Ka.
This is a temporary solution.
The cannon first--then the Gormak.
You know the enemy here. I'll follow your orders.
You're in command, sir.
You are the first. Do not become the last.
I'll bring down that cannon, or die trying.
I'll do my best, I guess.
Defeat the Gormak. Then you can die.
Just tell me how to help.
Who's going to make me?
The Mystics have seen it.
The cannon feeds on power. We will starve it.
The generators are in Gorma-Koss. Edan-Je will instruct you.
These charges connect to the generators. The commandos have hidden a detonator nearby.
Set the charges. Activate the detonator. The Gormak cannon will fall silent.
I'll have those charges set before the Gormak know I'm there.
Don't worry about me.
The Gormak protect the cannon. They will be ready.
Get word to Voss-Ka. The city should be evacuated.
Warn the city, just in case.
The Gormak weapon will not reach Voss-Ka. You will stop it.
I've never fought the Gormak on this scale.
Is there anything else?
To the Gormak, you are prey. They are animals.
A simple "please" goes a long way, you know.
Orders, orders, orders....
There is no time.
Charges, detonator, got it.
Voss-Ka must survive. Be quick.
It's your war. [Refuse quest]
You will defeat the Gormak.
This is a battleground. Outsiders do not belong.
